title: Red velvet brownie bars
ingredients: ['For the base', '100g soft brown sugar', '125g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon almond extract', '120g butter or margarine', 'For the brownie', '110g butter or margarine', '100g chocolate', '2 eggs', '200g dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '2 teaspoons red food colouring', '100g plain flour']
